head.citation-title: Tensor form of GPBiCG algorithm for solving the generalized Sylvester quaternion tensor equations
head.abstracts: © 2023 The Franklin InstituteSylvester quaternion tensor equations have a wide range of applications in image processing and system and control theory. In this paper, by the Kronecker product and vectorization operator and the properties of quaternion tensors, we focus mainly on proposing the tensor form of the generalized product-type biconjugate gradient method for solving generalized Sylvester quaternion tensor equations. As an application, we apply the proposed method to restore a blurred and noisy-free color video. The obtained numerical results illustrate the effectiveness of our method compared with some existing methods.

organization.$: Key Laboratory of Engineering Modeling and Statistical Computation of Hainan Province

grant-text.$: ☆ The work of the authors was partially supported by Hainan Provincial Natural Science Foundation of China grants 122MS001 and 122QN214, and the Academic Programs project of Hainan University grant KYQD(ZR)-21151 and KYQD(ZR)-21119.

coredata.dc:description: Sylvester quaternion tensor equations have a wide range of applications in image processing and system and control theory. In this paper, by the Kronecker product and vectorization operator and the properties of quaternion tensors, we focus mainly on proposing the tensor form of the generalized product-type biconjugate gradient method for solving generalized Sylvester quaternion tensor equations. As an application, we apply the proposed method to restore a blurred and noisy-free color video. The obtained numerical results illustrate the effectiveness of our method compared with some existing methods.
